name: DIE TRYING (elliot)
description:
Jessica Telephone is back, and she’s out for revenge! 

The Let’s Tear Up This Rotten World Together star finds herself in a new era, with new rules, a new Boss, and a whole new attitude. Grab the Dial Tone, because it’s time to climb your way to the top of the Idol Board and reclaim your place as the best batter in the ILB!

- HANG OUT WITH SOME OF THE ILB’S MOST POPULAR PLAYERS  - TEST YOUR LEGAL KNOWLEDGE IN THE BAR EXAM MINI GAME  - SIX DIFFERENT ENDINGS - WHICH WILL YOU GET?  Catch DIE TRYING at your local arcade this Fall!

--

DIE TRYING (it's friday afternoon, there goes antigone to be buried alive) is an interactive Blaseball story. This story works best on Desktop. It was only tested in Chrome browser but I'm sure Firefox works too. This story uses formatting that may cause eyestrain. Content warnings can be found on the first page.

All art by Cori @arrowsuns
